author.title: Consulting with purpose | Transforming goals into outcomes for leading global brandsConsulting with purpose | Transforming goals into outcomes for leading global brands

content: AI is booming — $600B+ today, on track to hit $1.8T by 2030. The possibilities? Huge.And yes, every time I correct ChatGPT, it responds like I’ve just uncovered a hidden truth of the universe. Nothing like getting a polite “You’re absolutely right!” to feel like I’m winning a gold star in a very supportive robot classroom.Just came across these AI stats — and honestly, who doesn’t love a good number? Stats make everything sound smarter… even when you’re still secretly googling “machine learning explained like I’m five.”As a new learner in the world of AI, I’m discovering something new every day. But as I go deeper into this journey, I’m especially curious about the how — not just hearing “we’re doing AI.” •	How are leaders embedding AI into business strategy (beyond the buzz)? •	How are they navigating culture change? •	How are people, process, and purpose aligning to create real value?If you’re leading or supporting a major AI initiative, I’d love to hear how it’s really going — what’s working, what’s not, and what you’ve learned.https://lnkd.in/eA9p4sWkhashtag#AI hashtag#AIbuzz hashtag#ChangeLeadership hashtag#DigitalTransformation hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#OrganisationalChange hashtag#BusinessStrategy hashtag#PeopleAndTech hashtag#ChatGPT
